title: Shopify
description: Shopify is a leading eCommerce platform that allows individuals and businesses to create their own online stores easily.

title: WooCommerce
description: WooCommerce is a customizable, open-source eCommerce plugin built on WordPress, ideal for small to large-sized online merchants.

title: Magento
description: Magento (now Adobe Commerce) is a powerful open-source eCommerce platform offering flexibility and scalability for complex stores.

title: BigCommerce
description: BigCommerce is a SaaS eCommerce platform known for its robust performance, scalability, and flexibility for growing businesses.

title: PrestaShop
description: PrestaShop is an open-source eCommerce solution that empowers small to medium-sized businesses to build online stores quickly.

title: OpenCart
description: OpenCart is a free, open-source online store management system offering powerful features and a user-friendly interface.

title: Squarespace Commerce
description: Squarespace offers a sleek and user-friendly platform for creatives and entrepreneurs to sell products and services online.

title: Wix eCommerce
description: Wix eCommerce provides a drag-and-drop platform for building stylish online stores with built-in marketing and SEO tools.

title: Ecwid
description: Ecwid is a cloud-based eCommerce platform that integrates seamlessly into any website, blog, or social media page.

title: Salesforce Commerce Cloud
description: Salesforce Commerce Cloud is a powerful B2C and B2B commerce platform that supports AI-driven personalization and scalability.
